data.title: Great Service
data.text: Just want to thank Megan for your quick and friendly service....we made it back to the shoot with plenty of time to eat our food, thanks to you!

data.title: Good Food - Poor Service
data.text:
I arrived around 6:30 PM and this place was packed. I waited for a seat to open at the bar and the bartender almost seemed annoyed that he had a new patron.
I didn't really care, because all I wanted was a drink and some food after a long day traveling and working.
The bar tender put a card in front of me with all the wing sauce selections available, when I asked what this was for he said "Have you never been here?  It's 55 cent wing night, these are the sauces you can order" and proceeded to move away.  No big deal right, and awesome that wings are on special because they are one of my favorite items to eat.
I ordered the standard wings and some Habanero wings as well.  The sauce was great, but the wings were a little small.
I probably will not go back to this place, due to the poor service.

data.title: Very good menu & reasonably riced
data.text: The atmosphere is great, fast, friendly service & a big selection on the menu.  Every time we've eaten at the pub it has been very good.  Huge selection of beer also.  The owners are wonderful people-very family oriented!!

data.title: Hidden gem in downtown Joliet
data.text: Good pub food and cool atmosphere. Owners are super cool and friendly and are always bringing live music and entertainment in. Hidden gem in a rougher area.

data.title: Perfect Pairing With A Night At The Rialto
data.text: This quaint downtown bar and grill is the perfect place to have a drink and grab something to eat when going to the Rialto Square Theater literally right across the street.  Great food that goes way beyond typical bar food.  The Ruben sandwich was the best I have ever had and believe me, I have had my share.  Great selection of draft beers, great service, food was up quick, and the prices were very reasonable.

data.title: very good service and food
data.text: Recently went here for dinner after shopping in Joliet. A very good choice. My husband ordered the reuben sandwich and loved it. I had the cheeseburger and potato casserole which was good as well. Our waitress was Whitney, who did a great job with accommodating us, making sure our drinks were filled and providing good service. The atmosphere was good, no complaints. Prices were very reasonable for a pub. Would come here again if in the area.
